abstract: Apple has sued Psystar, a Florida-based maker of Macintosh clones, claiming that the company makes poor-quality machines that infringe on Apple’s trademarks. Apple wants the company to stop making the clones and recall the ones already sold.
snippet: Apple has sued Psystar, a Florida-based maker of Macintosh clones, claiming that the company makes poor-quality machines that infringe on Apple’s trademarks. Apple wants the company to stop making the clones and recall the ones already sold.
lead_paragraph: UPDATED 5:38 P.M. |Psystar’s Web site is now running normally.

headline.main: Apple Sues Psystar to Block Macintosh Clone Sales
